search_term: Find the official pricing page URL for eSignatures (esignatures.com). Only provide the exact URL to the pricing page, not a summary of pricing information.
response_text: Here is the official pricing page URL for eSignatures: [https://esignatures.com/pricing](https://esignatures.com/pricing)【3:0†source】.

extracted_content.content:
eSignatures - Pricing page
===============

[![Image 1](https://cdncf.esignatures.com/assets/esignatures-logo-with-text-20241117-92d666aea36e672c1cb419e3f3aeef8f30bcf8a8bebaea5de3e6ea5ebbcae914.png)](https://esignatures.com/)

[Sign in](https://esignatures.com/login)

[Free trial](https://esignatures.com/#signup)

[Free trial](https://esignatures.com/#signup)

Simple, transparent pricing

$0.49 per contract

$0.04 per SMS (optional)

No monthly fees

No limits

All features included

Say goodbye to confusing pricing and shady fine print. At eSignatures.com, we believe in fair play - straightforward, good-value pricing that’s fast, efficient, and reliable. Whether you’re signing fifty contracts or fifty thousand, you’ll get everything you need with no limits, no negative surprises, and credits that never expire. This is how pricing should be.

pricing_data.pricing_notes: Credits purchased never expire, and all features are included without limits.

pricing_tiers.tier_description: Usage-based pricing for contracts and optional SMS.
Subscription plan with additional support and management features.
